Item.Text: Set or create an attribute using PythonPart framework
Item.Description:
This node sets the value of an existing attribute or creates it if it does not exist in the current project
**Typical Use:**
attribute as `string`
attribute as `integer` (included checkbox)
attribute as `double`
attribute as `date`
- attribute as `enum` (for predefined list selections)
- **Examples:**
AttributeName='TEST_STRING' (not exists)
AttributeValue='TEST_VALUE'
**Result**:
Create a new attribute 'TEST_STRING' as **Text** (type of the value)
- Set this new attribute to the PythonPart object with 'TEST_VALUE' as value
- AttributeName='TEST_LIST' (existing **ListBox** as `VALUE_0|VALUE_1|VALUE_2`)
AttributeValue=1
**Result**:
- Set this attribute to the PythonPart object with 'VALUE_1' as value
## Links
[Help](https://github.com/cmaignan-source/vsnodes/blob/main/VisualScripts/ALLPLAN%20FRANCE/README-SetOrCreateAttribute.md)

Item.Text: Change the value of an element attribute
Item.Description:
This node modifies existing elements by setting a new value for one of their attributes or by adding the attribute if it is missing
-
- **Example:**
Objects=BaseElementAdapterList(...)
AttributeID=507
NewValue='Hello'
**Result**:
Sets the attribute **Name** to 'Hello'
Please note that 'NewValue' can also be a list; in that case, each element receives a new value according to the order of the list.
## Links
[Help](https://github.com/cmaignan-source/vsnodes/blob/main/VisualScripts/ALLPLAN%20FRANCE/README-ChangeObjectAttribute.md)

This node returns the value of a specific attribute for one or more objects.
-
- **Example:**
Objects=BaseElementAdapterList(...)
AttributeID=507
**Result**:
List of values of the attribute **Name**
## Links
[Help](https://github.com/cmaignan-source/vsnodes/blob/main/VisualScripts/ALLPLAN%20FRANCE/README-GetObjectAttribute.md)
